# hello-hxhkim
Introducing Hahyun Kim.

Check it out here: https://pypi.org/project/hello-hxhkim/

### INSTALL
```bash
$ pip install hello-hxhkim
```

### USE


### DEV
```bash
$ git clone ...
$ cd hello-hxhkim
$ pdm venv create
$ source .venv/bin/activate
(hello-hxhkim-3.8) $ pdm install
```

### TEST
```bash
$ source .venv/bin/activate
(hello-hxhkim-3.8) $ pdm install
$ pdm add -dG test pytest pytest-cov
$ pytest
$ pytest -s
$ pytest --cov
```

### DEPLOY 
```bash
$ pdm publish
```

### CONTRIBUTING
```bash

```
